loginView.valueProp: Giving an easy and flexible work spot to decentralized teams

oneClickOffice.title: One click office
oneClickOffice.text: As easy as it sounds. Find the office that suits you best and book it with just one click. Our catalgogue of coworking is growing as the speed of light in cities like Barcelona, Madrid and Valencia. Download our app to discover the entire experience of partio.

ourPromise.title: Our promise
ourPromise.text1: In your city, or traveling, you can reserve your place of work without worries.
ourPromise.text3: Disconnect from your home routine, Meet colleagues and new people in the best spaces

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.text1: Explain brefely where they can search and how it works.
howItWorks.text2: Explain briefely how can they book.
howItWorks.text3: Same here. Finish with a sentence like. Meet colleagues and enjoy more your life.

aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.text: We are 4 young entrepenours wanting to make working life easier for everyone.

footer.title: Contact Partio
footer.text: Want to have more information or a meeting with the team? We are here to answer your questions.
